EmailTemplate.subject: Escalation Alert : Unattended Opportunity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear BSG TL,
This is an automated notification from our system.
We would like to bring to your attention an opportunity that requires immediate action. The opportunity (ID: {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c}) was assigned to {!Opportunity.BSG_User_Name__c} on {!Opportunity.BSG_Tagged_Time__c}. However, as of now, there has been no activity on this opportunity.
According to our records, this opportunity has remained unattended for more than 72 hours.
Best regards, Airtel
